text: The 2008–09 ISAF Sailing World Cup was a series of sailing regattas staged during 2008–09 season. The series featured boats which feature at the Olympics and Paralympics. == Regattas == {| class="wikitable" |- ! Date ! Regatta ! City ! Country |- | 14–19 December 2009 | Sail Melbourne | Melbourne | |- | 24–30 January 2010 | Miami OCR | Miami | |- | 27 March – 2 April 2010 | Trofeo Princesa Sofia | Palma | |- | 23–30 April 2010 | Semaine Olympique Française | Hyères | |- | 26–30 May 2010 | Delta Lloyd Regatta | Medemblik | |- | 19–23 June 2009 | Kiel Week | Kiel | |- | 9–14 August 2009 | Sail for Gold | Weymouth | |}
